JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Educated Chef wanted for a creative restaurant.
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a chef M/F for our little restaurant.

Are you, or do you perhaps know a passionate, creative chef. A person with respect for the profession, who maybe is tired of heating up prefabricated food, or got enough of impersonal large kitchens? Now the opportunity is here to unfold your creativity and influence the development of the restaurant, together with a small personal international team.
Café Mair´s is a cozy little popular a la carte restaurant with 30 seats, located in the center of Fredericia. We have a small but well-equipped kitchen, with space for a chef, a kitchen helper and a dishwasher.
We put a great effort into treat our fresh raw materials with the respect they deserve. Everything is made from scratch, and we are proud and popular for our knowledge of the content and quality of the food we serve to our guests.

If you are interested or have any questions, please don’t hesitate to write, call or just drop by.

Best regards 
Eva Mair, Cafe Mair’s

Eva@mairs.dk — her: Mair's.
